summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding a financial transfer issue related to an Excela bond. The emails discuss the status of the transfer and the actions being taken to resolve the issue.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is involved in the correspondence regarding a financial transfer issue and is seeking clarification on a bond transfer.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is responding to Richard Kahn's inquiries about the bond transfer and is actively working to resolve the issue.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is copied on the emails but does not actively participate in the conversation.

connections.description: Richard Kahn and Chad Markland are both financial consultants working together on resolving a bond transfer issue.
Jeanne Brennan is copied on the correspondence, indicating a professional relationship with Richard Kahn.

events.title: DTC Transfer Request Submitted
events.description: A DTC transfer request for the Excela bond was submitted.

events.title: Transfer Confirmation
events.description: Chad Markland confirmed with his back office that there were no issues with the DTC transfer request.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a bond transfer issue involving 3,000,000 of Excela bonds.
Chad Markland is actively working to resolve the bond transfer issue and has communicated with his back office.
The correspondence indicates a professional relationship between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland as financial consultants.
